mapper.sql: createTime, deleteStatus, emp_no, base_money, profit_money, other_money, real_money, remark, `year`, `month`, salary_no
id, emp_no, base_money, profit_money, other_money, real_money, remark, year, month, salary_no, createTime
mapper.select: select s.id, s.emp_no, s.base_money, s.profit_money, s.other_money, s.real_money, s.remark, s.`year`, s.`month`, s.salary_no, s.createTime, e.`name` emp_name, p.`name` emp_pos from sys_salary s LEFT JOIN sys_employee e ON s.emp_no=e.emp_no LEFT JOIN sys_position p on e.position_id=p.id where s.deleteStatus = 0 and e.name like concat ("%",#{emp_name},"%") and s.`year`=#{year} and s.`month` =#{month} order by s.createTime desc

select s.id, s.emp_no, s.base_money, s.profit_money, s.other_money, s.real_money, s.remark, s.`year`, s.`month`, s.salary_no, s.createTime, e.`name` emp_name, p.`name` emp_pos from sys_salary s LEFT JOIN sys_employee e ON s.emp_no=e.emp_no LEFT JOIN sys_position p on e.position_id=p.id where s.id = #{id} and s.deleteStatus=0
